mapper.select: select ts.student_id, student_name, course_name, usual_grade, final_grade, total_grade from tb_select inner join tb_student ts on tb_select.student_id = ts.student_id inner join tb_course tc on tb_select.course_id = tc.course_id inner join tb_score t on tb_select.course_id = t.course_id where t.course_id = #{courseId}

select ts.student_id, student_name from tb_select inner join tb_course tc on tb_select.course_id = tc.course_id inner join tb_student ts on tb_select.student_id = ts.student_id where tc.course_id = #{courseId}
